verses.name: Numbers 16:5
verses.text: And he spake unto Korah and unto all his company, saying, Even to morrow the Lord will shew who are his, and who is holy; and will cause him to come near unto him: even him whom he hath chosen will he cause to come near unto him.

verses.name: Numbers 16:6
verses.text: This do; Take you censers, Korah, and all his company;

verses.name: Numbers 16:7
verses.text: And put fire therein, and put incense in them before the Lord to morrow: and it shall be that the man whom the Lord doth choose, he shall be holy: ye take too much upon you, ye sons of Levi.
